item.title: Notes - CSS in Depth
item.description: Nearly every web programmer I met says: I know CSS, even tell me “CSS is simple”. So they undoubtedly write CSS in their skill set. But just writing several lines of CSS statements does not necessarily mean you are a qualified CSS user. This is the reason why I plan to learn CSS in depth. What I expect is to have a solid knowledge about how to write large scale CSS and understand why it works when layouting or styling.
